> [robione](#comment_1_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): 200MB? um no.

The wallets folder has the images for printing the paper wallets. I'd really hate to lose that feature. Logos no problem, but the paper wallet feature is integral I think.
